thread.title: Kate Upton, Ashley Graham and Nina Agdal ooze sex appeal
thread.title_full: Kate Upton, Ashley Graham and Nina Agdal ooze sex appeal | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Kate Upton, Ashley Graham and Nina Agdal ooze sex appeal
text:
All three ladies are wearing decidedly less clothing in the magazine they are celebrating.
But Kate Upton , Ashley Graham and Nina Agdal didn't need to get undressed to show off their sexy side at the Sports Illustrated release party in New York City Thursday night.
Kate, 24, who landed the coveted cover shot for the annual swimsuit issue, flaunted her famous cleavage in a low-cut mini-dress with colorful detailing at the bottom.
Scroll down for video
Trio of beauties: Kate Upton, Ashley Graham and Nina Agdal didn't need to get undressed to show off their sexy side at the Sports Illustrated release party in New York City Thursday night
The buxom blonde covered up the risque outfit with a well-fitted black blazer.
She showed off her endless legs by pairing the short dress with sky-high strappy stilettos.
As the honoree of the evening, the three-time cover girl chose sultry black eye makeup and a nude lip to allow her natural beauty to shine through.
The 24-year-old smiled broadly as she held up the cover featuring herself in a blue patterned blazer that highlighted her ample cleavage and tiny white bikini bottoms.
Kate, who landed the coveted cover shot for the third time for the annual swimsuit issue, flaunted her famous cleavage in a low-cut mini-dress with colorful detailing at the bottom
VIP: As the honoree of the evening, the three-time cover girl chose sultry black eye makeup and a nude lip to allow her natural beauty to shine through
Guest of honor: Kate looked to be having fun celebrating her third time as Sports Illustrated's swimsuit cover girl
Give your LBD the edge like Kate in Versace Versace jagged hem cocktail dress
Sold out! Shop the rest of the collection at Net-a-Porter...
Buy now
Kate Upton looks sensational on the cover of the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit 2017 Issue, but it's the dresses she's been wearing whilst doing the rounds to promote the magazine that we're more interested in.
Cushnie et Ochs and Gucci are some of the names in the mix, so of course she had a good little black dress lined up for the red carpet release party! She joined Ashley Graham and Nina Agdal at the event, wearing a dress from the Versace AW16 collection.
We're quite simply head over heels in love with the distinctive multicoloured wave detail along the hem. It's an effective way to transform an otherwise simple style, and when teamed with strappy heels, the model looked flawless.
Unfortunately her exact dress has now sold out, but click (right) to shop the rest of the collection at Net-a-Porter. Or go for Versace vibes with the help of our edit below.

Ashley Graham chose to take the glam to a whole new level for the evening.
The gorgeous brunette dressed her famous curves in a sultry black leather number complete with a deep slit up the side.
With her hair piled high on top of her head in a flirty ponytail, Ashley looked the picture of sophistication.
Sexy! Ashley Graham chose to take the glam to a whole new level for the evening in a sultry black dress that hugged all her curves
She went glam with her eye makeup, choosing a dark smokey effect, but decided to keep her lips a neutral tone.
Once inside, the role model posed with fellow models who also appeared in the issue.
She also took time to pose with Olympic gymnast Aly Reisman and Hannah Jeter who all appeared to be having a good time chatting at the party.
Glam gals: Once inside, the role model posed with fellow models who also appeared in the issue, including
Coordinating: The former SI cover girl piled high on top of her head in a flirty ponytail and looked the picture of sophistication
Beauties! Ashley posed with Olympic gymnast Aly Reisman and fellow model Hannah Jeter
Nina Agdal took a romantic turn in a light pink gown with a sweetheart bustier neckline.
The corset-style dress flowed down to just above her ankles so you could still see her gorgeous nude strappy heels.
The Dutch model wore her long blonde hair straight and parted down the center so it flowed loosely around her shoulders.
She appeared to wear minimal makeup to highlight her elegant features.
Dutch model Nina Agdal took a romantic turn in a light pink gown with a sweetheart bustier neckline
Romantic design: The corset-style dress flowed down to just above her ankles so you could still see her gorgeous nude strappy heels
63-year-old Christie Brinkley looked half her age in a bright red jumpsuit and voluptuous blonde curls.
She posed with her daughters Alex Rae Joel and Sailor Brinkley Cook who also joined her in the magazine.
Sailor and Alexa Ray both complimented their mother's look by choosing predominantly black outfits with touches of their own style.
Flawless! 63-year-old Christie Brinkley looked half her age in a bright red jumpsuit and voluptuous blonde curls
All in the family: She posed with her daughters Alex Rae Joel and Sailor Brinkley Cook who also joined her in the magazine
Sailor and Alexa Ray both complimented their mother's look by choosing predominantly black outfits with touches of their own style
Chrissy Teigen made a splash on the red carpet in a robe-dress that she cinched together with a thick belt and thigh-high black lace-up boots.
She slicked her hair back and accented her look with large hoop earrings.
The former Sports Illustrated cover girl brought her husband John Legend along with her for the festivities.
Trendsetter: Chrissy Teigen made a splash on the red carpet in a robe-dress that she cinched together with a thick belt and thigh-high black lace-up boots
Peas in a pod: The former Sports Illustrated cover girl brought her husband John Legend along with her for the festivities
Hannah Jeter showed off her growing baby bump in a sexy one-shoulder sequined gown that allowed her to show off her ample cleavage.
The gorgeous blonde, who is married to Derek Jeter, had the pregnancy glow as she opted for minimal makeup to highlight her gorgeous features.
She decided to wear her blonde hair sleek and straight parted down the center.
She's becoming a mom: Hannah Jeter showed off her growing baby bump in a sexy one-shoulder sequined gown that allowed her to show off her ample cleavage
Classic look: Model Hannah Ferguson opted for elegance in a white backless gown which emphasized her lithe frame
Ethereal: Hungarian model Barbara Palvin opted for a flowy light blue number that blew in the wind as she approached the event
Showing some skin: Later, she revealed the garment was in fact backless in addition to being somewhat sheer
Model Hannah Ferguson, 24, opted for elegance in a white backless gown which emphasized her lithe frame.
Meanwhile, Hungarian model Barbara Palvin, 23, opted for a flowy light blue number that blew in the wind as she approached the event.
Later, she revealed the garment was in fact backless in addition to being somewhat sheer.
As usual, the towering Hailey Clauson, 21, managed to turn heads with her lithe limbs thanks to a short white mini.
Statuesque: As usual, the towering Hailey Clauson, 21, managed to turn heads with her lithe limbs thanks to a short white mini
All tied up! It seemed Samantha Hoopes, 26, may have been inspired by the latest installment of the Fifty Shades franchise, as she showed up in a nude bodycon dress which was completely bound up with leather laces
Va va voom! Brazilian bombshell Lais Ribeiro, 26, was a knockout in her sheer red frock which put her very ample assets front and center
Pins on parade: Samantha Hoopes showed off her long lean legs as she stepped out for the event
Bottoms up: The blonde bombshell showed off her pert derriere in the super short dress
Happy: The leggy beauty was clearly thrilled at being at the event and couldn't wipe the smile off her face
All eyes on her! She couldn't resist capturing the attention of a fellow attendee
Wow: Professional Canadian tennis player captured attention in a slinky midnight blue number which showed off her flawless figure
Stunning: The athlete completed the look with a thick silver choker
Mane attraction: Her blonde locks were twirled up into a chic, curly ponytail
The dress also featured a plunging v-neck which showcased the 5ft11in beauty's ample cleavage.
It seemed Samantha Hoopes, 26, may have been inspired by the latest installment of the Fifty Shades franchise, as she showed up in a nude bodycon dress which was completely bound up with leather laces.
Brazilian bombshell Lais Ribeiro, 26, was a knockout in her sheer red frock which put her very ample assets front and center.
Stunner Kelly Gale, 21, also made sure her decolletage was on display in her orchid-hued dress, which included a cleavage cut-out as well as some cut-outs above her hips.
